Text: ppl this is my very first upload please tell me what u think
I have a problem with the sound on most of the episodes. If I skip somethis the rest of the show becomes mute and I have to start over.  I use VLC. Any tip on how to fix that?
Try Media Player Classic Home Cinema, best player ive ever used.
If u get error when u try to use the player u must download DirectX
K-Lite Codec Pack 8.0.0 (Full) is what works with Media Player Classic

I use vlc as well. I had downloaded season 2 by itself from another user who has them separate and there was a problem with audio gone after the theme on episodes 1-9 only of season 2.  Epsidoes 10 on are fine in season 2. This would seem to indicate it is a problem with the original file and not the user who commented. I have not had that problem with any other downloads with vlc. I am wondering if you got your season 1 and 2 from them. I was hoping your files would be problem free.
Additional note:  only those s2 1-9 the intro volume is much louder than the others that are ok and there is a repetitive little tick in the audio. Something may have been overloaded on ripping.
